description:
Adds 9 Far Eastern-themed costumes, one each for Ryza, Klaudia, Lent, Tao, Patricia, Bos, Federica, Dian, and Kala.

Featured costumes:
- Ryza: Summer Festival Star
- Klaudia: Master Samurai
- Lent: THE SAMURAI
- Tao: Master of Jet Black
- Patricia: Master of Silence
- Bos: Bakumatsu Sword Master
- Federica: Princess of the Keep
- Dian: Warrior in the Arena
- Kala: Specter of Joy

Note: This item is planned to be released before the end of May 2023.

Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" from the diary on the desk in the atelier. The respective character must be in your party.
The content of the Season Pass and release dates are subject to change without notice. Please visit the official website for more information. 
This item is included in "Atelier Ryza 3 Season Pass." Please avoid making redundant purchases.
name: "Far East Travelers" Costume Set
